root.title: Potential Defense Evasion Via Right-to-Left Override
root.description: Detects the presence of the "u202+E" character, which causes a terminal, browser, or operating system to render text in a right-to-left sequence. This is used as an obfuscation and masquerading techniques.
root.author: Micah Babinski, @micahbabinski

falsepositives.item: Commandlines that contains scriptures such as arabic or hebrew might make use of this character
